name: flickeringly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shines with a light that is sometimes bright and sometimes weak: We walked through a flickeringly lit passage into the courtyard. The flickeringly atmospheric lighting of the restaurant was certainly charming.
in a way that appears for a short time before disappearing again: Hopes for a peaceful outcome were revived, but only flickeringly. I was flickeringly aware that there was some unhappiness among the students, but I didn't realize how strong their feelings were.
More examplesFewer examplesThe aurora borealis spread flickeringly across the night sky.The installation consists of flickeringly fluorescent panels of light.The novels have been in print flickeringly since her death.
